members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Optional accessibility label (aria-label) attribute that will be stamped on to the element. If none is specified, the aria-label attribute will contain the item name

members.name: canCheck
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not this menu item can be checked

members.name: checked
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not this menu item is currently checked.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional css class to apply to the menu item

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IContextualMenuRenderItem interface. This will get passed down to ContextualMenuItem.

members.name: customOnRenderListLength
members.descriptionHtml: When rendering a custom component that is passed in, the component might also be a list of elements. We want to keep track of the correct index our menu is using based off of the length of the custom list. It is up to the user to increment the count for their list.

members.name: data
members.descriptionHtml: Any custom data the developer wishes to associate with the menu item.

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the menu item is disabled

members.name: getItemClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Method to provide the classnames to style the individual items inside a menu. Deprecated, use `styles` prop of `IContextualMenuItemProps` to leverage mergeStyles API.

members.name: getSplitButtonVerticalDividerClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Method to provide the classnames to style the Vertical Divider of a split button inside a menu. Default value is the getVerticalDividerClassnames func defined in ContextualMenu.classnames

members.name: href
members.descriptionHtml: An optional URL to navigate to upon selection

members.name: iconProps
members.descriptionHtml: Props that go to the IconComponent

members.name: inactive
members.descriptionHtml: This prop is no longer used. All contextual menu items are now focusable when disabled.

members.name: itemProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional IContextualMenuItemProps overrides to customize behaviors such as item styling via `styles`.

members.name: key
members.descriptionHtml: Unique id to identify the item

members.name: keytipProps
members.descriptionHtml: Keytip for this contextual menu item

members.name: name
members.descriptionHtml: Text description for the menu item to display Deprecated, use `text` instead.

members.name: onClick
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when the menu item is invoked. If ev.preventDefault() is called in onClick, click will not close menu. Returning true will dismiss the menu even if ev.preventDefault() was called.

members.name: onMouseDown
members.descriptionHtml: A function to be executed onMouseDown. This is executed before an onClick event and can be used to interrupt native on click events as well. The click event should still handle the commands. This should only be used in special cases when react and non-react are mixed.

members.name: onRender
members.descriptionHtml:
Method to custom render this menu item. For keyboard accessibility, the top-level rendered item should be a focusable element (like an anchor or a button) or have the `data-is-focusable` property set to true.

The function receives a function that can be called to dismiss the menu as a second argument. This can be used to make sure that a custom menu item click dismisses the menu.

members.name: onRenderIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for the menu item icon

members.name: primaryDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: If the menu item is a split button, this prop disables purely the primary action of the button.

members.name: rel
members.descriptionHtml: An optional rel when using href. If target is _blank rel is defaulted to a value to prevent clickjacking.

members.name: role
members.descriptionHtml: Optional override for the role attribute on the menu button. If one is not provided, it will have a value of menuitem or menuitemcheckbox.

members.name: secondaryText
members.descriptionHtml: Seconday description for the menu item to display

members.name: sectionProps
members.descriptionHtml: Properties to apply to render this item as a section. This prop is mutually exclusive with subMenuProps.

members.name: shortCut
members.descriptionHtml: [TODO] Not Yet Implemented

members.name: split
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not this menu item is a splitButton.

members.name: style
members.descriptionHtml: Additional styles to apply to the menu item Deprecated, use `styles` instead.

members.name: submenuIconProps
members.descriptionHtml: Props that go to the IconComponent used for the chevron.

members.name: subMenuProps
members.descriptionHtml:
Properties to apply to a submenu to this item.

The ContextualMenu will provide default values for `target`, `onDismiss`, `isSubMenu`, `id`, `shouldFocusOnMount`, `directionalHint`, `className`, and `gapSpace`, all of which can be overridden.

members.name: target
members.descriptionHtml: An optional target when using href

members.name: text
members.descriptionHtml: Text description for the menu item to display

members.name: title
members.descriptionHtml: Optional title for displaying text when hovering over an item.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional css class to apply to the ContextualMenuItem

members.name: classNames
members.descriptionHtml: Classnames for different aspects of a menu item

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IContextualMenuRenderItem interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: dismissMenu
members.descriptionHtml: This prop will get set by ContextualMenu and can be called to close the menu this item belongs to. If dismissAll is true, all menus will be closed.

members.name: dismissSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: This prop will get set by ContextualMenu and can be called to close this item's subMenu, if present.

members.name: getSubmenuTarget
members.descriptionHtml: This prop will get set by the wrapping component and will return the element that wraps this ContextualMenuItem. Used for openSubMenu.

members.name: hasIcons
members.descriptionHtml: If this item has icons

members.name: index
members.descriptionHtml: Index of the item

members.name: item
members.descriptionHtml: The item to display

members.name: onCheckmarkClick
members.descriptionHtml: Click handler for the checkmark

members.name: openSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: This prop will get set by ContextualMenu and can be called to open this item's subMenu, if present.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: checked
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the menu item is checked.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Accept custom classNames

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the menu item is disabled.

members.name: dividerClassName
members.descriptionHtml: The optional class name to apply to the divider element.

members.name: expanded
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the menu item is expanded.

members.name: iconClassName
members.descriptionHtml: The optional class name to apply to the icon element.

members.name: isAnchorLink
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates if a menu item is an anchor link.

members.name: itemClassName
members.descriptionHtml: The optional class name to apply to the item element.

members.name: knownIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates if the icon used is of the known set of icons.

members.name: primaryDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the primary section of a split menu item is disabled.

members.name: subMenuClassName
members.descriptionHtml: The optional class name to apply to the sub-menu if present.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: anchorLink
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a menu item that is an anchor link.

members.name: checkmarkIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Default style for checkmark icons.

members.name: divider
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a divider item of a ContextualMenu.

members.name: icon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the icon element of a menu item.

members.name: iconColor
members.descriptionHtml: Default icon color style for known icons.

members.name: item
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a menu item that is an anchor link.

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the label of a menu item.

members.name: linkContent
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the content inside the button/link of the menuItem.

members.name: linkContentMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a menu item that is a link.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the root element.

members.name: secondaryText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the secondary text of a menu item.

members.name: splitContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the container of a split menu item.

members.name: splitMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the menu portion of a split menu item.

members.name: splitPrimary
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the primary portion of a split menu item.

members.name: subMenuIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the submenu icon of a menu item.

tables.name: IContextualMenuProps
tables.descriptionHtml: React.Props is deprecated and we're removing it in 6.0. Usage of 'any' should go away with it.

members.name: alignTargetEdge
members.descriptionHtml: If true the positioning logic will prefer to flip edges rather than to nudge the rectangle to fit within bounds, thus making sure the element aligns perfectly with target's alignment edge

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria label for accessibility for the ContextualMenu. If none specified no aria label will be applied to the ContextualMenu.

members.name: beakWidth
members.descriptionHtml: The width of the beak.

members.name: bounds
members.descriptionHtml: The bounding rectangle for which the contextual menu can appear in.

members.name: calloutProps
members.descriptionHtml: Pass in custom callout props

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional css class to apply to the ContextualMenu

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IContextualMenu interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: contextualMenuItemAs
members.descriptionHtml: Method to override the render of the individual menu items

members.name: coverTarget
members.descriptionHtml: If true the position returned will have the menu element cover the target. If false then it will position next to the target;

members.name: delayUpdateFocusOnHover
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the contextual menu will not be updated until focus enters the menu via other means. This will only result in different behavior when shouldFocusOnMount = false

members.name: directionalHint
members.descriptionHtml: How the element should be positioned

members.name: directionalHintFixed
members.descriptionHtml: If true the position will not change sides in an attempt to fit the ContextualMenu within bounds. It will still attempt to align it to whatever bounds are given.

members.name: directionalHintForRTL
members.descriptionHtml: How the element should be positioned in RTL layouts. If not specified, a mirror of `directionalHint` will be used instead

members.name: doNotLayer
members.descriptionHtml: If true do not render on a new layer. If false render on a new layer.

members.name: focusZoneProps
members.descriptionHtml: Props to pass down to the FocusZone. NOTE: the default FocusZoneDirection will be used unless a direction is specified in the focusZoneProps (even if other focusZoneProps are defined)

members.name: gapSpace
members.descriptionHtml: The gap between the ContextualMenu and the target

members.name: getMenuClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Method to provide the classnames to style the contextual menu. Default value is the getMenuClassnames func defined in ContextualMenu.classnames. Deprecated, use `styles` prop of `IContextualMenuProps` to leverage mergeStyles API.

members.name: hidden
members.descriptionHtml: If specified, renders the ContextualMenu in a hidden state. Use this flag, rather than rendering a ContextualMenu conditionally based on visibility, to improve rendering performance when it becomes visible. Note: When ContextualMenu is hidden its content will not be rendered. It will only render once the ContextualMenu is visible.

members.name: id
members.descriptionHtml: DOM id to tag the ContextualMenu with, for reference. Should be used for 'aria-owns' and other such uses, rather than direct reference for programmatic purposes.

members.name: isBeakVisible
members.descriptionHtml: If true then the beak is visible. If false it will not be shown.

members.name: isSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Whether this menu is a submenu of another menu or not.

members.name: items
members.descriptionHtml: Collection of menu items.

members.name: labelElementId
members.descriptionHtml: Aria Labelled by labelElementId

members.name: onDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Callback when the ContextualMenu tries to close. If dismissAll is true then all submenus will be dismissed.

members.name: onItemClick
members.descriptionHtml: Click handler which is invoked if onClick is not passed for individual contextual menu item. Returning true will dismiss the menu even if ev.preventDefault() was called.

members.name: onMenuDismissed
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the contextualmenu is being closed (removing from the DOM)

members.name: onMenuOpened
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when the contextualmenu has been opened.

members.name: onRenderMenuList
members.descriptionHtml: Method to override the render of the list of menu items.

members.name: onRenderSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Method to call when trying to render a submenu.

members.name: shouldFocusOnContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to focus on the contextual menu container (as opposed to the first menu item).

members.name: shouldFocusOnMount
members.descriptionHtml: Whether to focus on the menu when mounted.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: subMenuHoverDelay
members.descriptionHtml: Delay (in milliseconds) to wait before expanding / dismissing a submenu on mouseEnter or mouseLeave

members.name: target
members.descriptionHtml: The target that the ContextualMenu should try to position itself based on. It can be either an Element a querySelector string of a valid Element or a MouseEvent. If MouseEvent is given then the origin point of the event will be used.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: title
members.descriptionHtml: Optional title to be displayed on top of the menu.

members.name: useTargetAsMinWidth
members.descriptionHtml: If true the context menu will have a minimum width equal to the width of the target element

members.name: useTargetWidth
members.descriptionHtml: If true the context menu will render as the same width as the target element

members.name: dismissMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Dismiss the menu this item belongs to.

members.name: dismissSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Function to close this item's subMenu, if present.

members.name: openSubMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Function to open this item's subMenu, if present.

tables.name: IContextualMenuSection
tables.descriptionHtml: React.Props is deprecated and we're removing it in 6.0. Usage of 'any' should go away with it.

members.name: bottomDivider
members.descriptionHtml: If set to true, the section will display a divider at the bottom of the section.

members.name: items
members.descriptionHtml: The items to include inside the section.

members.name: title
members.descriptionHtml: The optional section title.

members.name: topDivider
members.descriptionHtml: If set to true, the section will display a divider at the top of the section.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Accept custom classNames

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: container
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the container which parents all menu items.

members.name: header
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the header item of a ContextualMenu

members.name: list
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the list that contains all menuItems.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Base styles for the root element of all ContextualMenus.

members.name: subComponentStyles
members.descriptionHtml: SubComponent styles.

members.name: title
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the contextual menu title.

members.name: callout
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the callout that hosts the ContextualMenu options

members.name: menuItem
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the item in the list

members.name: anchorLink
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a menu item that is an anchor link.

members.name: checkmarkIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Default style for checkmark icons.

members.name: divider
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a divider item of a ConextualMenu.

members.name: iconColor
members.descriptionHtml: Default icon color style for known icons.

members.name: item
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for a menu item that is an anchor link.

members.name: linkContent
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the content inside the button/link of the menuItem.

members.name: subMenuIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the submenu icon of a menu item.
